Scripts.OnClick: if ( MarketWatcher.History.edit ) then if ( MarketWatcher.GetNumScans(MarketWatcher.History.edit) > 0 ) then StaticPopup_Show("MARKETWATCHER_DELETE_ITEM"); else MarketWatcher.History.DeleteItem(); end end

Scripts.OnEnter: if ( self:GetParent().itemLink ) then GameTooltip:SetOwner(self, "ANCHOR_TOPRIGHT"); GameTooltip:SetHyperlink(self:GetParent().itemLink); if ( EnhancedTooltip ) then EnhancedTooltip:Hide() end end
if ( self:GetParent().itemLink ) then GameTooltip:SetOwner(self, "ANCHOR_TOPRIGHT"); GameTooltip:SetHyperlink(self:GetParent().itemLink); if ( EnhancedTooltip ) then EnhancedTooltip:Hide() end end
